last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Peyami tries to make sense of tragedy, a mysterious message sends him back to a place from his youth. Esvet learns the truth about her ancestry.

name: The Tailor
overview: A famous tailor begins to sew a wedding dress for his best friend’s fiancée – but all three have dark secrets that will soon upend their lives.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A famous tailor begins to sew a wedding dress for his best friend’s fiancée – but all three have dark secrets that will soon upend their lives.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Peyami faces new challenges as his friendship with Dimitri is tested, Esvet spends more time at the house with Mustafa — and a new woman enters his life.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Peyami's feelings for Esvet intensify, forcing him to make the difficult choice between their love and his lifelong friendship with Dimitri.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: After a painful visit to his hometown, a famous tailor returns to Istanbul with a secret. Meanwhile, his best friend hides a secret of his own.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After Esvet runs away, a devastated Dimitri asks for Peyami’s help. Sülün insists on Firuze marrying Mustafa, but Peyami confronts his grandmother.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Tensions simmer between the two families during a dinner at Peyami’s. Firuze’s negligence could spell disaster for Peyami.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Dimitri is angry with Faruk after Esvet escapes again. Firuze accepts Sülün’s proposal. Peyami discovers Firuze’s true identity.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Dimitri’s doubts put Peyami in a tough spot and lead him to take drastic measures. During a dress fitting, sparks fly between Firuze and Peyami.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Sülün confirms her suspicions about Firuze after talking with Lia. Dimitri learns the real reason behind why Ari’s determined to find Esvet.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Esvet discovers Peyami's secret identity. Dimitri pays a visit to Peyami's home. A confrontation at the ranch ends in unexpected tragedy.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A famous tailor begins to sew a wedding dress for his best friend’s fiancée – but all three have dark secrets that will soon upend their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Peyami drinks to forget his troubles and brings a date to Dimitri and Esvet's wedding. But when the ceremony starts, Peyami is nowhere to be found.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: After a wild night, Dimitri wakes up alone. Peyami skips an important meeting to be with Cemre. Esvet and Peyami argue — and disaster strikes.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Peyami faces pressure to deliver his new collection and Ari threatens to replace him. Dimitri shares news with his family, to Esvet's dismay.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Dimitri tells Ari what he knows about Esvet's parents. An office cleaner helps Peyami after he has a meltdown. Mustafa sees a face from his past.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Peyami visits Osman and demands answers about his mother. Dimitri makes a surprise announcement at dinner and later, walks in on a shocking scene.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: While cleaning, Kumru finds a piece of the past that inspires Peyami to draw on the joyful memories of his grandfather. Esvet pays a visit to Kumru.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A reenergized Peyami drops a bombshell and Dimitri forces him into a showdown. Esvet meets Peyami at a restaurant where his past meets his present.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Dimitri destroys a painful relic from his childhood. Learning the truth about his parents, Peyami moves forward with unveiling his new collection.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Peyami faces new challenges as his friendship with Dimitri is tested, Esvet spends more time at the house with Mustafa — and a new woman enters his life.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Returning home from a long business trip, Peyami locks eyes with Esvet at a welcoming party — and Dimitri makes a stunning announcement.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Facing the inevitable, a tearful Peyami says goodbye to Esvet, while Dimitri gets drunk and humiliates his father.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A clever plan from Peyami's parents buys him time to figure out his next move. Dimitri becomes paranoid, accusing Ari of manipulating him.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Esvet and Peyami steal time together and make decisions. But when Dimitri can't reach either one of them by phone, he gets suspicious.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The clock ticks down on the trip to the US while Peyami tries to come clean to an increasingly frantic Dimitri — and Esvet can't bear him anymore.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Ari arrives at the ranch for a tense meeting with his son. Later, Peyami helps cover up Dimitri's lies.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Peyami and Esvet walk in on a disturbing scene when they meet Dimitri. The two men reminisce about their childhood before disaster strikes.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: As Peyami tries to make sense of tragedy, a mysterious message sends him back to a place from his youth. Esvet learns the truth about her ancestry.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Peyami's feelings for Esvet intensify, forcing him to make the difficult choice between their love and his lifelong friendship with Dimitri.
